dct_title_s: Bacon's bird's-eye view of South Africa, with enlarged views of Natal, and Mafeking to Pretoria
dct_description_sm: Title taken from cover. Relief shown pictorially. Insets: Mafeking to Pretoria -- Northern Natal. Historic Maps copy imperfect: cover wanting.
